name: Contact Form with CAPTCHA
description: A privacy-friendly contact form featuring ALTCHA proof-of-work protection. Perfect for portfolios and company websites.

name: Newsletter Signup
description: High-conversion minimal design with gradient background and benefit checklist. deal for blog sidebars and exit modifications.

name: Resource Download
description: Two-column layout designed for gated content like eBooks and whitepapers. Includes company info fields.

name: Demo Request
description: Professional split-screen B2B layout with testimonials and use-case selection. Best for SaaS product pages.

name: Webinar Registration
description: Event-focused layout with speaker info, timezone selection, and calendar integration.

name: Waitlist Signup
description: Viral-loop ready waitlist form with animated background, position counter, and social sharing options.

name: Job Application
description: Comprehensive application form with resume upload, nuanced fields, and GDPR consent.
